title: Pines Square Dental Clinic
address: Ground Floor, Lot 6891, Block 225, Kuching North Land District at Lrg Pines Square, 2A4, Jalan Batu Kawa, New Township, 93250 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

reviews.name: Wendy Csy
reviews.text: Good‚Ä¶‰ª∑Èí±‰πüÂÖ¨ÈÅìüëç

reviews.name: Amy Lau (Peachy_amy)
reviews.text:
Brought my 2 year old here for a consultation because of toothache that turned out to be his teeth erupting. Dr. Tay is so so patient with my boy and waited for him to relax before checking his teeth. Bribery was involved, but I'm a fan of whatever works! My toddler has a fear of dentists and isn't easy to work with but Dr. Tay was incredibly compassionate dealing with the tantrums and managed to take a good look at his teeth. He's so good with kids. I'm so grateful for his patience.

Facility is very new and clean and everyone was super friendly. Parking was super easy too! Great experience overall!

reviews.name: Laura Cotter
reviews.text: Super satisfied with their service and treatment! Dr Tay Jr (I think) was super profesh and friendly. He made me feel comfortable the moment I entered the room. He was gentle with my teeth and made sure I was okay. It was my first time whitening my teeth, and I couldn‚Äôt be more happy! I‚Äôm definitely coming back as a regular patient! üôåüèº

reviews.text: I highly recommend this Pine Square Dental Clinic for those of you who are looking for a dedicated and highly experienced dentist who can immediately diagnose, solve your dental problems and makes sure it's done well. Highest quality of service indeed. Thank you very much for solving my serious dental problem. Appreciate it very much.

description:

title: Chong Clinic
address: Twin Tower Centre, Ground Floor 2 1/2 Mile, Rock Road, Sarawak, 93250 Kuching, Malaysia

reviews.name: Gabriel Jay
reviews.text: Sorry to say this but the receptionist seemed to be lacking of politeness when communicating with the patients here. Fyi, a smile and an ounce of politeness doesn't cost you at all. People like us wouldn't walk into clinics like these if this issue persists. I urge you to look into this A.S.A.P

reviews.name: delly nabau
reviews.text: Very bad service. Not recommended!

reviews.name: aaronting
reviews.text: Do not visit this clinic! The doctor does not maintain a professional appearance and keeps patients waiting for an extended period.

reviews.name: Kick K (Zakk Fazz)
reviews.text:
Dr. Chin gave a clear diagnosis of my skin conditions and explained the treatment well, which made me feel comfortable and confident. His calm and caring attitude really helped. What truly stood out was his calm and soft voice, which had a soothing effect, instantly putting me at ease. Clinic opens at 8am and Dr. will attend at 8:30am. If you want to avoid long wait then come early. Clinic staff are friendly and helpful too.

However, I noticed some issues cluttering of boxes and document at the back of the clinic that could be a fire safety concern, and the visitor toilet would be better if it had a bidet and toilet paper.

reviews.name: Gerard Pius Gleeson
reviews.text: The doctor is very good at diagnosing problems.

reviews.name: Ted Chang
reviews.text: Patient and Knowledgeable Doctor and friendly staffs. TQ

reviews.name: Egg Mayoo
reviews.text: Waiting time is too long, moreover people that came later than me have their turn first.

reviews.text: When I come at 7.30pm, the staff told me the premis already closed. Should update the operation hours.

reviews.name: Puteri Nuraisyah
reviews.text: everyone here is so friendly especially the doctor!

reviews.name: Angeline Chin
reviews.text: ÂæàÂûÉÂúæ ÊüúÂè∞‰∫∫ÂëòËÑ∏ÈªëÂà∞ÂÉèÊàë‰∫èÊ¨†‰ªñ‰ª¨‰∏ÄÊ†∑ Á¨¨‰∏ÄÊ¨°Êù• Â∞±ÊòØ‰∏çÁü•ÈÅì ‰ªñ‰ª¨Âà∞Âá†ÁÇπ ÁªìÊûú Âú®ÂÆ¢Êà∑Èù¢ÂâçÊïÖÊÑèÂüãÂÜ§„ÄÇÊ≤°ÊúâÁ¨¨‰∫åÊ¨°‰∫Ü„ÄÇ ËçØ‰ª∑‰πüÂæàË¥µÂæàË¥µ„ÄÇÂåªÁîüÂíåÊüúÂè∞‰∫∫ÂëòËµ∂ÁùÄËµ∞„ÄÇ

reviews.name: De Lunya Official
reviews.text: The doctor so professional and explain everything detail.. there friendly keep it up guys

reviews.name: Muhammad Azlan Jay Abdullah
reviews.text: Extremely good service provided by the doctor, Dr Aaron Enosh. A very professional and knowledgeable practitioner, kudos to him! No wonder he is the most recommended doctor in Kuching, Sarawak.

reviews.name: Cassandra Goh
reviews.text:
Bad experiences for me!
First time am visiting this clinic and was attended by Dr. Aaron Enosh.

I was having throat inflammation (sore), phlegm and start to have body ache/ feel feverish (not yet fever).
Also at the same time having some lips allergy.

I was here cause of previous Google review saying the doctor here was good for lips allergy & I tot why not one stone kill 2 birds so here I am.

I wonder if the doctor is sincerely wanna treat me or just rush to see next patient/ off duty :-(

Btw, I only managed to see him for less than 3 mins. The whole process is like rushing me off saying no issue with my condition for flu & my lips.

When I shared with the doctor am having some lips allergy, he said he can see the redness but never ask for how long this start to happen (am having lips eczema for a while) and just replied will give me some medicine so not to worry.

I have no chance to continue cause he said is done. You may go now. So I trust his professionalism as a doctor.

However after I collected 5 types of medication, I realised that it was only for flu related.
So I head back again and asked where is the lips allergy medicine.

The counter staff at first just said the medicine for inflammation also can help. Am in the puzzle how could a throat inflammation medication can help with lips allergy issue. Maybe it can but there is no explanation from the doctor so I have doubts.

Then doctor in the room telling them to give me a Lip Balm. I show the staff I already have a lip balm and I don‚Äôt need another one. I need cure.

End up they gave me allergy medicine. Before hand it over to me still asked me do you want it?

I kind of disappointed with this whole process and yet you are feeling sick!

Lastly, what is the ethics to become a doctor? Don‚Äôt you all wanna help patients? But the feeling they gave me is just for the sake of money.

Sincerely.

reviews.name: Kola
reviews.text:
‚ú®Ô∏è Highly recommended for patients who don't know where to visit, looking for reasonable price, friendly doctor and good service.

Had a lip allergies which lasted more than a month for twice last year (was testing diff lipstick brand) and my problem was solved in just 2-3 days with the lipbalm+medications given. Dr Aaron was very detailed in explaining and ofcourse he knows how to lift his patients mood! Had my 3rd visit here now(fever+tonsilitis), and i'm happy with service compared to other clinics i've visited!

reviews.name: Adrian Kong
reviews.text: Understanding, responsible n patience..

title: Klinik Julian Wee
address: 312, Bee San Building, Jln Padungan, Road, 93100 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

reviews.name: Sarra Jesstika
reviews.text: Worth it. Been coughing for almost a month, went to several clinics in between, a family member suggested to go to Julian Wee‚Äôs clinic. So I did, now my coughing gradually stopped.Recommended!

reviews.name: mohammad nazrul
reviews.text: Unprofessional and rude staff. Overpriced. Save your money and go somewhere else folks

reviews.name: faishh nur
reviews.text: Saya tanya dr. ada ka tidak.. tapi terus kena letak talipon. Rude staff. ü•π

reviews.name: Deborah L.
reviews.text:
Don‚Äôt understand the bad reviews. It‚Äôs my first time and I have to say I have rarely received kinder, non-judgemental treatment from doctors and their assistants than I have here.

Yes, the price is steeper than other places. But I got nebbed, jabbed and plied with meds after a very thorough check. I can‚Äôt complain, especially after seeing two doctors prior for a prolonged throat infection for nearly a month.

reviews.name: Winter Night
reviews.text: Really good for asthma patient but if general sickness like flu,coughing,headache, please stay away from this clinic, not recommend this clinic please find others, don't waste your money.my mum got cough go there and they simply just give asthma medicine and it cost rm180,the doctors and staffs are also damn rude, can't accept any opinions,drug dispenser is the worst, didn't give prescription carefully.

reviews.name: Jelaos Smilee
reviews.text: The staff at the medicine counter is not friendly

reviews.name: isyraf r
reviews.text:
Lousy clinic , inexperience staff , üíØ percent business minded with suboptimal care

1. Doctor too young and lack experience. If a doctor dont listen to patient , it is a total failure . He also seems too rushing , probably unable to handle a busy clinic alone .

2. Drug dispensers are the worst . Can you please prescribe properly? Write the drug name and indication clearly . Not just simply said how many tablet to take . Very dangerous if patient simply ate wrongly

3. With a 5min consultation and a bunch of unnecessary medicine, it cost freaking RM200! Walaweh owner rich sia sleep with money ady . You should include in details how much each medicine cost and not just simply write total amount to be paid only! Lousy

4. Pity those patient who really need proper and optimal care . Just avoid this clinic and save your money . Thanks !

description:

reviews.name: G. U.
reviews.text: Service oklah but doctor need to act professional with nurses. Please show a good manner infront of patient. I know you pay their salary but they also human. If you wanna teach them,teach professionally. Not scold or being rude infront of patient. Sudahla sakit gigi, stress lagi dgr doctor marah marah nurse. No wonder nurses in this clinic always new face cause they come & go in short period.

reviews.text: I wish to thank you to Dr. Isaac for making my experience so painless and  stress-free. You are the most helpful and competent dentist~ for making everything so care-free and straightforward

reviews.name: Jacqueline Ronna
reviews.text: Recommended by my friends. This is my first time and the procedure is smoother than I thought! One thing that I don't preferably was the tension between the staffs. But overall, I love the interior designs of the clinic and the excellent customer service provided during the procedures started in surgery room. Also, they were so meticulous in every procedures taken to avoid patient (me) feel uncomfortable/pains in any chances. I strongly recommend this kind of services to try. Worth every penny!

description:
In the heart of Bandar Riyal, Sarawak, Klinik Pergigian Smiledontics Dental Clinic stands out as a paragon of dental care, where every smile is treated with precision and compassion. This clinic is not just about routine dental services; it's about a dedication to crafting radiant smiles through state-of-the-art technology and personalized care. Specializing in a variety of dental treatments, from preventative to cosmetic dentistry, Smiledontics is where expert knowledge meets the warmth of community healthcare.

The clinic prides itself on its modern facilities, designed to ensure that every patient experience is comfortable, hygienic, and efficient. From the moment patients step into the clinic, they are greeted by an ambiance that eases dental anxieties and a team that listens with empathy. Despite the absence of textual feedback, the narrative of care is spoken through the gentle hands of dentists who navigate dental complexities with finesse. Their commitment to professionalism is evident, striving to maintain harmonious staff dynamics that reflect positively on patient interactions.

Conveniently accessible within Bandar Riyal's bustling streets, Smiledontics caters to the local community's dental needs six days a week. Its strategic location ensures that patients can easily fit dental visits into their busy schedules, making essential dental care less of a task and more of a part of life's routine. The clinic's proximity to local landmarks and thoroughfares underscores its integration within the fabric of the neighborhood, making it a go-to spot for residents seeking trustworthy and accessible dental care. As Smiledontics continues to serve its community with unwavering dedication, it remains an indispensable part of Sarawak's healthcare landscape.

title: Tanah Putih Dental Clinic
address: Jalan Kwong Lee Bank, Tanah Putih, 93450 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia

reviews.name: Bgiel
reviews.text:
Awesome service! I was served patiently at the counter and during dental check-up. I thought we can only  do check-up appointment through my sejahtera and wanted to ask for reschedule(they cannot done it for you,need to according to my sejahtera)but it turns out the appointment is for check-up AND directly filling or scaling. If you wanted to have a basic check-up or urgent tooth extraction they can just do it for you immediately.
A very good service compared to UTC last time, since I need to wait around 30 minutes for the nurse that taking care of the counter to come out JUST to explain to me about their latest system (my sejahtera) I can't even get a BASIC check-up. The worse part is while waiting I can hear clearly that the nurses are laughing and chitchatting inside even though her colleagues had told her the arrival of the patient!

reviews.text:

reviews.text: Dr Anthony Bong is our best family  dentist over the 15+ years. His style is very patient and nice in talking so cum his staff, his clinic is very clean too. Most of all, his drilling or filling or scaling, he will alert if there is a slight pain. No fear to have it done often. Moreover, the fees are reasonable compared to his knowledge and skills! Another thing is if you don't go for washing or scaling, in the long run will cause gum problems and will cause you very bad health. (The teeth poison do affect us). We all like to recommend Dr Anthony Bong to anyone around us here.

reviews.name: Kelvin Tan
reviews.text:
Expensive. Painful. Long procedure.

First time coming here, as I have toothache and my usual dental clinic is fully booked. I called up many clinics and all were fully booked except for this.

I did scaling, polish, and filing of one decayed tooth.

Scaling was ok.

Polish was painful as they used jets of water to blast away the stain. Imagine using water gun on the soft tissue in your mouth.

Filing took a long time even though it was only one tooth. The procedure was very uncomfortable.

Whole procedure took more than 40minutes and RM150 for scaling and RM150 for filing.

Normally in other clinics I pay RM100 for scaling and RM80 for filing and only 10min or so.

description:
In the heart of Sarawak, Sim Dental Surgery stands as a premier destination for dental excellence, harmoniously combining advanced dental practices with the warm hospitality the region is known for. This facility's reputation for delivering meticulous care is echoed in its patient testimonials, citing experiences of confidence-inspiring professionalism and virtually painless procedures. Dr. Sim, the leading practitioner, is celebrated for his skillful touch in dental implants, transforming patient apprehensions into stories of relief and satisfaction. The facility's standout feature is its commitment to pain-free, top-tier dental services that cater to the needs of each individual with precision and empathy.

At Sim Dental Surgery, the state-of-the-art facilities resonate with the quality of care provided. From routine check-ups to complex implant surgeries, the clinic harnesses cutting-edge technology to ensure outcomes that patients not only need but also deserve. The clinic hours are thoughtfully scheduled to accommodate busy lifestyles, offering extended evening hours twice a week for added convenience. The heartfelt feedback from those treated at Sim Dental Surgery often highlights the attentive care and exceptional skill of Dr. Sim and his team, painting a picture of a healthcare experience that goes beyond mere treatment to encompass genuine care and understanding.

Strategically situated along Jalan Song, Sim Dental Surgery is easily accessible to residents and visitors alike, seamlessly fitting into the vibrant tapestry of the community. Its location offers ample opportunities for patients to combine their dental visits with other errands or leisure activities in the bustling neighborhood. The clinic's commitment to serving the community is reflected in its flexible scheduling and patient-centric approach, making it a trusted fixture in Sarawak's healthcare landscape. With an unwavering focus on providing exemplary dental services, this facility not only enhances smiles but also fortifies the wellbeing of those under its care.
